title: IT BURNS LIKE A
description: Have a member of your team acquire their Infernal Cape for the first time. Anybody who has killed Zuk before on ANY account is ineligible.

title: THE SPIDER'S DEN
description: With only members from your bingo team, complete a Normal Mode ToB without having a single member die.

title: ...OR GIVE ME DEATH
description: Have a member of your team acquire their Dizana's Quiver for the first time. Anybody who was killed Sol before on ANY account is ineligible.
